document_data.name: Quench the Spirit
document_data.mainbody: '''''Quench the spirit''''' was a powerful [[Divine magic|divine]] [[necromancy]] [[spell]] used by priests devoted to [[Myrkul]], enabling them to extinguish a victim's life force.
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed the caster to kill any target they pointed at with a bone finger when the bone was snapped. The victim could not be raised or resurrected. [[Human]] victims of this spell could be raised several days later by the caster as [[ju-ju zombie]]s under their control. A simple ceremony involving the priest's [[holy symbol]] and six vials of [[unholy water]] was required to do this.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as a [[material component]] a [[human]] finger bone to cast.
